game_description: Znanyeland is a virtual theme park, to provide a safe and cost-free theme park experience. Immerse yourself in a virtual game and discover a world of limitless possibilities brimming with fun and excitement. Enjoy the thrills and enchantment of a theme park from the comfort of your own home. From the joys of a rollercoaster ride to levitating water slides, Znanyeland is the safest way to relish the excitement of a theme park. There is something for everyone! Get nostalgic and savour the thrill of it all. hop on and take a ride!
review_1: When I "rode" the Ferris wheel "ride" which consists of 4 carriges with a blocked view only overlooking the ugly blocky theme park. There were no people at the theme park but for some reason TWO stray dogs that bark inseccantly when you get on the ride. There is also some weird voice-over saying things like "the next stop is station yellow." And it never stopped. I COULDN'T GET OFF! I honestly felt like I was in a horror title. Not sure how this got onto app lab or how it got any more than 2 stars by anyone. Maybe I'm missing something. Worth an install just to see how horrifying the theme park is and ponder the great questions of the universe like "where is station yellow????"
review_2: Look, it's not without imperfections, but it's free and it gives you a virtual reality theme park, there is literally no other Quest 2 game like it! You can see a full exploration and review here: https://youtu.be/Ge75lcVRapU
review_3: Not the worst VR amusement park (some of the other are just insanely amateurish).
review_4: Visitors can enjoy rides, as well as an entire theme park, equipped with a food area, the park to play the game.
review_5: This game was really boring for me.
